quote: You can't force love, I realized. It's there or it isn't. If it's not there, you've got to be able to admit it. If it is there, you've got to do whatever it takes to protect the ones you love.
quote_letters: YOU CANT FORCE LOVE I REALIZED ITS THERE OR IT ISNT IF ITS NOT THERE YOUVE GOT TO BE ABLE TO ADMIT IT IF IT IS THERE YOUVE GOT TO DO WHATEVER IT TAKES TO PROTECT THE ONES YOU LOVE
